{{Infobox Airport | name = Air Force Station Port Elizabeth | nativename = | nativename-a = | nativename-r = | image = | image-width = | caption = | IATA = PLZ | ICAO = FAPE | type = | owner = | operator = [[South African Air Force]] | city-served = | location = [[Port Elizabeth]], [[Eastern Cape Province]], [[South Africa]] | elevation-f = 226 | elevation-m = 67 | coordinates = | latd = 33 | latm = 59 | lats = 24 | latNS = S | longd= 25 | longm= 36 | longs= 37 | longEW= E | coordinates_type = | coordinates_region = | coordinates_notitle = | image_map = | image_mapsize = | image_map_alt = | image_map_caption = | pushpin_map = Eastern Cape | pushpin_label_position = | pushpin_label = Air Force Station Port Elizabeth | pushpin_map_alt = | pushpin_mapsize = | pushpin_image = | pushpin_map_caption = Location in the Eastern Cape Province | website = [http://www.af.mil.za/bases/bases.html www.af.mil.za] | metric-rwy = Yes | r1-number = 08/26 | r1-length-f = 6,496 | r1-length-m = 1,980 | r1-surface = Asphalt | r2-number = 17/35 | r2-length-f = 5,501 | r2-length-m = 1,677 | r2-surface = Asphalt | r3-number = 10/28 | r3-length-f = 3,805 | r3-length-m = 1,160 | r3-surface = Grass | footnotes = }} '''Air Force Station Port Elizabeth''' is a [[South African Air Force]] facility situated on the north-eastern side of the [[Port Elizabeth Airport]] main runway. It was downgraded from an Air Force Base in the early 1990s.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.saairforce.co.za/the-airforce/bases/18/air-force-station-port-elizabeth |title=Air Force Station Port Elizabeth |publisher=Saairforce.co.za |date= |accessdate=2012-06-18}}</ref>
It is home to C Flight of [[15 Squadron SAAF|15 Squadron]] which currently operates four [[MBB/Kawasaki BK 117|BK 117]] helicopters. Their primary role is maritime and landward [[search and rescue]]. Conversion to [[AgustaWestland AW109]] helicopters has been postponed due to delays in developing emergency flotation equipment for the type, thus precluding its use in a maritime environment.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.saairforce.co.za/news-and-events/704/retirement-of-saaf-bk117-may-be-further-delayed |title=Retirement of SAAF BK117 may be further delayed |publisher=Saairforce.co.za |date= |accessdate=2012-06-18}}</ref>
==Units hosted== *C Flight of 15 Squadron *[[108 Squadron SAAF|108 Squadron]] - Territorial Reserve squadron operating various civil light aircraft in the utility transport role.<ref>{{cite web|url=http://www.saairforce.co.za/the-airforce/squadrons/45/108-squadron |title=108 Squadron |publisher=Saairforce.co.za |date= |accessdate=2012-06-18}}</ref>
==See also== *[[South African Air Force Museum#Port Elizabeth|Port Elizabeth branch of the SAAF Museum]] - another SAAF facility located at the airport
